title: $2,150 / 5rm 3br about 800 sq ft Avail 8/1 (Brockton)
posting_body: 5rm 3bd, third floor, gas heat by steam, cats ok.
De-leaded unit and building with certificates.
Brand new Silestone countertops, off street parking and three porches.
You pay for heat and electricity.
Please have pay-stubs and other information readily available
so it's easier to verify your information all at once.
This is a non-smoking building, there is a front and back porch on which to smoke.
Please TEXT during the day as I am working, you can call at night.
I will go through your application on the phone and then setup individual appointments to show this.
